chunks.text:
Create the transfer transactions in the system and ensure the ranging is reflecting correctly.

 

@Sharon Pinto <mailto:Sharon.Pinto@chalhoub.com>  please support with consumer happiness certificate. Share the TL with store.

 

@Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>  please arrange Insurance certificate and share it with store team as soon as readiness.

 

@Abdalla Ahmed <mailto:Abdalla.Ahmed@chalhoub.com>  ensure all IT equipment are installed before 16th Nov and access are granted for SIOCS and Xstore. please ensure connection is active.

 

@Abdalla Ahmed <mailto:Abdalla.Ahmed@chalhoub.com> @Lorena Dimaala <mailto:Lorena.Dimaala@chalhoub.com> @Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com> @Sheljan KOCHAPPAN1 <mailto:Sheljan.KOCHAPPAN1@chalhoub.com>  please provide documents to apply for mall permits.

 

@Mary Janice Dofeliz <mailto:MaryJanice.Dofeliz@chalhoub.com>  Ensure connection in the store is scheduled.

 

As I’m going on leave, please for any support reach out Muhammed Sweadan.

 

Regards,

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

KAWTTAR NASSIK​​​​
SENIOR ASSOCIATE ‑ RSO
ALLIED ENTERPRISES LLC
DUBAI
‑
UNITED ARAB EMIRATES
‑

li Zeb Siyal <Alizeb.Siyal@chalhoub.com>; Mohammed El Neel <Mohammed.Elneel@chalhoub.com>; Rawad Hossein <Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com>
Subject: RE: RSO UAE - STORE RENOVATION - Ferragamo - Dubai Mall

 

Dear All,

 

Kindly reminder on completing the below tasks for the Ferragamo Dubai Mall opening,

 

“Ferragamo Boutique at Dubai Mall” Handover date on 15th Nov the re-opening date is on Tuesday 19th Nov 2024.

 

Do not hesitate reaching me out for any support required!

 

Thanks,

 

MUHAMMED SWEADAN​​​​

MANAGER ‑ RSO

ALLIED ENTERPRISES LLC

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES
